input_text:
Job Title: Sales Development Representative

Location: Salt Lake City, UT

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
About Kadence: There are few things that change everything, the world moving to hybrid working will be one of them. Kadence exists to make flexible work an advantage for organizations all over the world - powering a more positive, productive and personalized way of working.
9/10 of companies, $25tn of employee salaries and $22tn of office real estate is moving to hybrid. Kadence is building the operating system to power the hybrid age - creating a triple bottom line for People, Profit and the Planet.Over 450+ companies around the world use Kadence to make hybrid work, from space booking, to coordinating who should be onsite with who. Don’t just take our word for it, Kadence is backed by leading investors including Kickstart, firstminute.capital, Manta Ray, Techstars as well as leading future of work operators such as the co-founders of Slack, Okta and Teem.
Role Overview: As a Kadence SDR, you’ll be an outbound trailblazer, tasked with identifying and qualifying promising leads that could transform into long-lasting partnerships as we help organizations make hybrid work. You will be equipped with all the tools you need to increase your reach through email, social, and phone calls. As you hone your skills in lead generation, prospecting, and client engagement, you'll be building a solid foundation for future growth in our fast-growing sales division. Working closely with our VP of Revenue this person will be driven by the desire to meet and exceed our aggressive monthly, quarterly, and annual revenue targets.
Key Responsibilities:Identify, contact, and qualify potential customers.Set appointments using email, social, and phone calls and confirm demos.Collaborate with the sales team to develop strategies for reaching personal and team targets.Use CRM software to manage leads and sales activities.Attend networking events and tradeshows to build relationships.
Requirements:A drive to work in a fast-paced, international, and ever-changing environment.Commitment to being based in Salt Lake City, with the flexibility for in-person collaboration.Bachelor’s degree or equivalent preferred but not required. Sales experience is preferred but not required.
Your Benefits:Competitive salary$50k base + commission + bonus compensation Comprehensive benefits package including 5 weeks of paid vacation, healthcare for individuals and families as well as a generous 401k plan
By joining Kadence, you'll have the opportunity to be part of a fast-growing, early-stage venture capital backed company. This means you'll have access to resources, mentorship, and a network of experienced professionals who are committed to helping you succeed.
You'll also have the opportunity to play a critical role in shaping the future of the company and making a real impact in the Future of Work.
We believe hybrid work will reshape the way the world works for the next century. We’re so passionate about this that we’ve crafted the Hybrid Manifesto - please check it out before applying for the role.
The final thing to share with you is a little about our culture here at Kadence. We seek out people who embody our values and passion for reshaping the future. For us that means:
You're a self-starter who doesn't need to wait for directions. Your ambition and initiative guide you. You have an ability to sell your perspective to functional peers and leadershipYou're quick to learn, eager to apply new insights, and carry a sense of responsibility toward Kadence, our partners, and customers.You're trusted to follow through on your commitments with integrity.You're a pioneer who drives forward for solutions across our business, unfazed by new challenges.You're focused, and cut through distractions to execute plans, unafraid of failure.Your warmth and humor make you a joy to collaborate with. You are happy and agreeable, even in challenging situations.

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Sales Development Representative
output_json.summary: Kadence seeks a Sales Development Representative to identify and qualify potential customers, set appointments, and collaborate with the sales team to reach targets.
job_responsibilities: Identify, contact, and qualify potential customers
Set appointments using email, social, and phone calls
Collaborate with the sales team to develop strategies
Use CRM software to manage leads and sales activities
output_json.company_information: Kadence is a fast-growing, early-stage venture capital-backed company focused on enabling hybrid work. It offers a triple bottom line for People, Profit, and the Planet.

other.content: Kadence values self-starters, quick learners, and those who are trusted to follow through with integrity. They are pioneers who drive solutions across the business and are focused, even in challenging situations.
Kadence believes in reshaping the future of work and has crafted the Hybrid Manifesto.
